headline: Constellation Energy Stock Rises on DOE Deal. What a Shuttered Nuclear Plant Has to Do With It.
summary: Constellation Energy will receive a $1 billion loan to restart Three Mile Island, which has been renamed the Crane Clean Energy Center.
